createdTs.description: the timestamp when the corresponding L2Block which includes L2tx is created

finalizedTs.description: the timestamp when L1Tx is finalized at Layer1

l1TxBody.description:
store the entire L1Tx. client will fetch it later for further signatures.
* when it's at 'DONE', then will not return this field to client.

l1TxHash.description: record the L1TxHash when it's claimed

l2TxId.description: entity id of corresponding L2 tx

outputNoteCommitment.description: here is a unique index here

outputNoteCommitmentIdx.description: the leaf index on data_tree, will be updated when L2tx is confirmed at L2's Block

status.description: record if it has already been claimed.
